song.title: Party Night (Walkin' in the Park - vocals version)
song.info:
Lyrics:
A lonely warm mid-August night, on the streets of old downtown, I'm watching the red-green neon lights and get lost inside the sound. But I just want to take you in my arms and go dance the night away, so I follow the masses and drink lots of glasses and forget about today.
Refrain:
It is just Party Night under the pale moon light, it is just Party Night and I keep on searching for you. It is still Party Night under the electric light, it is still Party Night and I got to spend it with you.
I'm walking slowly thru traffic lights and the smell of gasoline, I'm travelling, I'm circling subway lines to stations I've never been. But I just want to keep you in my heart for the rest of all my days, so I follow the cars along the great boulevards and go blow my mind away!
8) Yeah baby, I got to find you, on the streets of this lonely town. Somehow, some way, I'll get to you, tonight! 8)
Refrain:
It is just Party Night under the pale moon light, it is just Party Night and I keep on searching for you. It is still Party Night under the electric light, it is still Party Night and I got to spend it with you.
I remember the special evening I saw your face the last time (the last time). Your eyes were flashing like strobo lights and love was in your smile (in your smile). But I just couldn't stay, I ran away, there were other things to do (other things to do). Few minutes later I felt the pain inside, I couldn't sleep because of you, because of you!
